trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> that may contain a collection of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Classe astratta che, quando implementata, rappresenta una <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> che può contenere un insieme di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> figlio.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup> can be a child of another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup> può essere un figlio di un altro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class, with default properties.
trans-unit.target: Consente l'inizializzazione di una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> con le proprietà predefinite.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> con l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: The object to be added as the child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da aggiungere come figlio di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: If this object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> it will be added to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> collection; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se questo oggetto è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />, verrà aggiunto all’insieme <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" />; in caso contrario, verrà generata un’eccezione.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto figlio <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The parameter <paramref name="child" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="child" /> non è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.

trans-unit.source: The text added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: Testo aggiunto all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a text string as a child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge una stringa di testo come elemento figlio di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an InvalididOperationException unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> non accetta un testo come figlio, pertanto questo metodo genererà InvalididOperationException a meno che una classe derivata ha eseguito l'override di questo comportamento consente l'aggiunta di testo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a type-specific clock for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clock specifico del tipo per questa sequenza temporale.

trans-unit.source: A clock for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: Clock per questa sequenza temporale.

trans-unit.source: If a derived class overrides this method, it should only create and return an object of a class inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: Se una classe derivata esegue l'override di questo metodo, deve solo creare e restituire un oggetto di una classe che eredita da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of direct child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la raccolta degli oggetti figlio diretti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetti figlio <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è **null**.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della proprietà di dipendenza <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, questo metodo copia i riferimenti alle risorse e i data binding (che potrebbero non essere più risolti), ma non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto clonato sarà <see langword="false" />, anche se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto di origine è <see langword="true." />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />, eseguendo copie complete dei valori correnti di tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti alle risorse, i data binding e le animazioni non vengono copiati, ma vengono copiati i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto clonato sarà <see langword="false" />, anche se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto di origine è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object, using this instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea un’istanza di un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> utilizzando l'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto figlio da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto figlio.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: Testo da aggiungere all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il contenuto di testo di un nodo all'oggetto.
